posts.post_content: Really looking for one in 3 or better condition. Would also like one with a polar bear back, but any back works. Please send offers. thank you.

Hey Wazoo,

E-mail sent re this SGC 50 for $215, paypal, includes delivery.  Alas it's not a Polar Bear back though.
